mapper.update: update invoice_split_line set GROUP_STATUS=#{groupStatus} where DOC_NUM=#{docNum}
mapper.select:
select
from invoice_split_line where DOC_NUM = #{docNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY GOLDTAX_NUM DESC

select
distinct
from invoice_split_line
order by ${orderByClause}
